characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This model can fire its Blackstar cluster launcher as it flies over enemy units in its Movement phase.  To do so, after this model has moved, pick one enemy unit that it flew over.  Then roll one D6 for each model in the enemy unit (up to a maximum of 10 D6).  Each time you roll a 6 the unit being bombed suffers 1 mortal wound.
